epics.title: Create Project Requirements
epics.description: Project Requirements consist of Epics, User Stories and Scenarios which are done in Sprints

user-stories.means: to create user stories
to add epics to a project
to create sprints with a start and end date

epics.title: Create Project Attributes
epics.description: Project Attributes like Team Members or Personas can be created to give more infomation

user-stories.means: to assign team members to a project
to create various personas for a specific project

epics.title: Add User Story Attributes
epics.description: Attributes like assignees, status, notes etc can be added to user stories to give more informantion

user-stories.means: to add assignees to a specific user story
user-stories.benefit: the project team knows who is working on this user story

user-stories.means: to add personas to specific user stories
user-stories.benefit: the developers will have a better understanding of the user

user-stories.means: to add tasks to a specific user story
user-stories.benefit: I know what has to be done

user-stories.means: to add labels to a user story
user-stories.benefit: it gains more information about what to do with it

user-stories.means: to add notes to a user story
user-stories.benefit: I can communicate with other assignees on the specific user story

user-stories.means: to add a start and end date to a specific user story
to add acceptance criteria to a user story

epics.title: Edit User Story Attributes
epics.description: Attributes like assignees, status, notes etc can be edited

user-stories.means: to annotate words in a user story as a class or as a method
user-stories.benefit: the project team has the same mental model

user-stories.means: to be able to add tests to a specific user story

epics.title: Storyboard Functionality
epics.description: The Kanban Board should have similar functionality like in Trello or Jira

user-stories.means: the Kanban board story cards to be minimalistic
to click on the Kanban board story cards to get more information about a specific story card
to filter story cards in a kanban board according to various criteria, such as label, assignee, etc.
to drag and drop story cards into one of the columns, i.e., not-started, in-progress and done
to be able to see which is the current sprint
to see which classes in a specific user story are already created and which aren't
to see which classes belong or relate to a specific user story
to see how many tests pass and fail for a specific user story
to have a quick overview if the acceptance criteria of a user story is fulfilled
to have a quick overview on the progress and status of a specific project
to have a quick overview on the progress of a specific epic’s user stories
to see if epics start and end date overlap
user-stories.benefit: I can manage the time in the project team properly

user-stories.means: to see if user stories start and end date overlap
user-stories.benefit: I can manage my development time

user-stories.means: and need to obtain a feedback when a class or a method name referred in a user story changes
to add a new contact to an address book
to add a new phone number to a contact
to edit the first name of a specific contact
to edit the last name of a specific contact
to edit a specific phone number of a specific contact
to remove an entire contact
to remove a specific property, such as a specific phone number, of a specific contact

epics.title: Place an online order
epics.description: This epic covers requirements that specify how can one place an online order

user-stories.means: to explore the online menu
to add the menu items to the shopping cart
to do one click payment
to enter my delivery and payment details to make the payment

epics.title: Place an order in a restaurant
epics.description: This epic covers requirements that specify how can one place an order in a restaurant

user-stories.means: to enter the selected menu items by guests to prepare an order
to be able to forward the received order to the chef
to be able to customize the order by modifying the default menu items

epics.title: Invoicing
epics.description: This epic covers requirements that specify how invoices are calculated

user-stories.means: to update the tax values for both online and offline orders, in case they legally change
to update the tax values for individual menu items
to be able to view the invoice before printing it to check if the correct prices and tax is applied
to be able to view the total price before printing the invoice

epics.title: Scheduling shifts
epics.description: This epic covers the functionality to manage the scheduling of staff shifts.

user-stories.means: to mark weekly offs of my choice in the schedule
to mark workshop days in the schedule
to assign both doctors and nurses to a shift
to have an access to and overview of the vacation plans and wishes of the doctors and nurses
to have an access to workshop days of the health staff
an overview of the already assigned working hours for individual staff member
to get feedback in case I assign doctors and nurses in non-permissible shifts
to have an overview of the remaining night shift compensation time of each staff member
to assign health staff in total five shifts
to have an overview of my compensation hours

epics.title: Patient database
epics.description: This epic covers the database management for the patient records.
